mapper.select: SELECT u.phone,u.true_name,u.sex,u.birthday,u.qq,u.user_pic,c.type,c.company_name,c.part,c.work_address,c.doctor_pic,c.state,c.fail_reason,c.judge FROM USER u LEFT JOIN certification c ON u.user_id=c.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};
SELECT user_id FROM certification WHERE user_id=#{userId};

SELECT IF(u.sale_id IS NOT NULL,1,2) AS isBindSale FROM USER u LEFT JOIN sale_info s ON u.sale_id=s.sale_id WHERE u.user_id=#{userId} UNION ALL SELECT s.true_name AS saleName FROM USER u LEFT JOIN sale_info s ON u.sale_id=s.sale_id WHERE u.user_id=#{userId} UNION ALL SELECT s.phone AS salePhone FROM USER u LEFT JOIN sale_info s ON u.sale_id=s.sale_id WHERE u.user_id=#{userId}
SELECT phone,true_name FROM sale_info WHERE phone=#{salePhone};
